name: Asteroid Belt (sinisterfly)
description:
A game like the classic asteroids, that I made as a practice project.

Similar controls, UP and DOWN to move forward and back.

LEFT and RIGHT for rotating.

Reload page to reload game if escape was pressed.

Only works on PC.

Special thanks to Coding Kaiju, GDQuest, jmbiv, Kenney.nl and Godot Engine docs.
